segments.text: Wow . She can be really nasty , can't she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . She was right . I was too nervous . I kept thinking , What if we blow it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I guess Zina figured you couldn't blow it if you were in the hotel room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She even stayed at a different hotel . She said I might be contagious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , at least we have Stars.com . That'll be great publicity .
segments.speaker: S1
